heroSectionDescription: Leverage the productivity of commercial Large Language Models like ChatGPT and Gemini without compromising data privacy.
securityDescription: Your sensitive data is protected with end-to-end encryption and processed locally or in secure cloud environments.
multiLLMReadyDescription: Seamlessly connect to leading LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude through our secure API gateway.
gdprCompliantDescription: Built with privacy by design. Fully compliant with European regulations.
deployLocallyDescription: Install our proxy solution within your infrastructure for maximum control.
configureDescription: Set up anonymization rules and connect to your preferred AI models.
integrateDescription: Use AI securely without compromising privacy or compliance.
samplePlainPrompt: On January 15, 2025, Maria Rossi, HR Manager at ExampleTech S.p.A., sent an internal communication reporting a violation of company policies by Luigi Verdi.
sampleAnonymizedPrompt: On [DATE_1], [FIRST_NAME_1] [LAST_NAME_1], HR Manager at [COMPANY_NAME_1], sent an internal communication reporting a violation of company policies by [FIRST_NAME_2] [LAST_NAME_2].
